title: Facile one-pot synthesis and in silico study of new heterocyclic scaffolds with 4-pyridyl moiety: Mechanistic insights and X-ray crystallographic elucidation
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Fathy M. Abdelrazek, Magdi E.A. Zaki, Sami A. Al-Hussain, Basant Farag, Ali M. Hebishy, Mohamed S. Abdelfattah, Safaa M. Hassan, Ahmed F. El-Farargy, Lyuba Iovkova, David Mross, Sobhi M. Gomha
